name: Radio Noise
description:
Serena Rivers is a high school girl who lives with her older brother, Jonah. When tragedy strikes their small town, Serena discovers she has the ability to tell when people are lying, and uses this ability to track down other people with powers, one of which might be a murderer...

This is my entry for the RenPy Jam, as well as my first published game, so I am looking for constructive criticism on anything you can think to critique.

This game also serves as a short story/introduction to the world that I'm attempting to set most of my future games in.

Music by Alcaknight (Soundcloud) and Kevin MacLeod
Background Images from Pexels
